title: Enjin
text:
Enjin (エンジン; formerly 円神), stylized in all caps, is a Japanese boy band consisting of eight former Produce 101 Japan contestants. They debuted with the single, "Say Your Name / Enjin" in February 2021.


== History ==
Enjin was formed on June 15, 2020. They released their debut single, "Say Your Name / Enjin", on February 10, 2021. Their second single, "Peace Summer / Treasure", was released on August 4. They released their third single, "Far away", on January 19, 2022. Their debut album, O, was released on September 7. Their fourth single, "Merry Go Round", was released on March 29, 2023. They released their fifth single, "Dreamland", on September 13. Fumiya Kumazawa graduated from the group on December 31. Their second album, Inception, was released on June 12, 2024.


== Members ==


=== Current ===
A.rik
Ryono
Tsubasa
Hyuga
Toy
Taiga
Sol
Kyo


=== Former ===
Fumiya Kumazawa (熊澤歩哉)
